keywords.value: CIVIL WAR (THE WAR BETWEEN THE STATES)

docs.snippet: The stupendous uprising of the warlike yeomanry of the Great Northwest far surpasses the calculations of even those most familiar with the vast and gallant hordes which that section is capable of rallying to the field of battle.
docs.lead_paragraph: The stupendous uprising of the warlike yeomanry of the Great Northwest far surpasses the calculations of even those most familiar with the vast and gallant hordes which that section is capable of rallying to the field of battle.

docs.snippet: A very interesting ceremony took place on Saturday afternoon at Fort Schuyler. At evening parade a very handsome stand of colors was presented to the Regiment on behalf of GEORGE KEMP, Esq., from whom Adjt. HAMLIN read aloud the following letter:

headline.main: THE GREAT EASTERN.; Her Second Visit to New-York How she was Received.

docs.snippet: Given, a thousand men who volunteer for military service, the question is how to make them most effective against the enemy? to what discipline to subject them? what arms to put into their hands? As to drill, of late years a change of opinion and...
docs.lead_paragraph: Given, a thousand men who volunteer for military service, the question is how to make them most effective against the enemy? to what discipline to subject them? what arms to put into their hands? As to drill, of late years a change of opinion and practice has taken place similar to that which we have already noticed with regard to uniform.

headline.main: MISCELLANEOUS REBELLION NEWS.; AFFAIRS IN MARYLAND. MESSAGE OF GOV. BLAIR, OF MICHIGAN. MORE PIRACY IN VIRGINIA. TO VOLUNTEER NURSES. FROM PENSACOLA. RESIGNATION OF MAJOR MORDECAI. GOV. PICKENS AGAIN. THE GOVERNMENT CHARTERING OYSTER VESSELS. The Boston Transcript says: THE SURRENDER IN TEXAS. ANOTHER OUTRAGE. MILITARY HOSPITALS.
